name: marky-markdown
description: Table of Contents. Bookmarks. Section Numbering. Auto-update them on save.

commands.title: Marky Markdown: Add/Update the Table of Contents (TOC)
Marky Markdown: Remove the Table of Contents (TOC)
Marky Markdown: Select a Statistic for the Status Bar

markyMarkdown.bookmarks.levelRange.description: Select the range of heading levels (from most important to least important) to which bookmarks are managed. For example, having a range of '2..6' includes headings from level 2 to level 6.
markyMarkdown.bookmarks.levelRange.patternErrorMessage: Must define a range of numbers in the format of '2..6'. The numbers must be between 1 and 6. The first number should be greater than or equal to the second number.

markyMarkdown.bookmarks.linkText.description: Customize the text for heading bookmark.

markyMarkdown.bookmarks.linkImagePath.description: Add an image to the heading bookmark. If both text and an image are specified, the image will come first.

markyMarkdown.sectionNumbering.levelRang.description: Select the range of heading levels (from most important to least important) to which section numbering is added. For example, having a range of '2..6' includes headings from level 2 to level 6.
markyMarkdown.sectionNumbering.levelRang.patternErrorMessage: Must define a range of numbers in the format of '2..6'. The numbers must be between 1 and 6. The first number should be greater than or equal to the second number.

markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.levelRange.description: Select the range of heading levels (from most important to least important) to which the Table of Contents will include. For example, having a range of '2..6' includes headings from level 2 to level 6.
markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.levelRange.patternErrorMessage: Must define a range of numbers in the format of '2..6'. The numbers must be between 1 and 6. The first number should be greater than or equal to the second number.

markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.label.description: Add a label to the top of the Table of Contents.

markyMarkdown.tableOfContents.listType.description: Choose the list type for the Table of Contents.

markyMarkdown.slugifyStyle.description: Creates a formatted version of the heading text that can be used as an ID, this is used as a fragment URL in links. Vendors produce slugs that are formatted differently.

markyMarkdown.statisticStatusBarItem.description: Choose the statistic item that is shown in the status bar.

markyMarkdown.updateOnSave.description: Update the Table of Contents, Section Numbers, and Bookmarks automatically when the document is saved.
